description: Decompose graphs into their biconnected components. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://graphviz.org/pdf/bcomps.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Decompose one or more graphs into their biconnected components:
Print the number of blocks and cutvertices in one or more graphs:
Write each block and block-cutvertex tree to multiple numbered filenames based on output.gv:
